cause.description:
1 of every 3 African-American males born into this country will be imprisoned at some point in their lives. However, blacks only make up about 12% of the U.S. population. This is a wrong that must be made right before its too late.
1. Racism is still alive and well and is implemented through the justice system.
2. The fall of the black family is due to the imprisonment of our black males.
cause.mission: cease the unfair imprisonment of African-American men.
cause.name: Stop Imprisoning our Black Men
